titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Speeches and Articles by and about Presidents of Yale University
Speeches and Articles by and about Presidents of Yale University
titlestmt.author: compiled by Manuscripts and Archives Staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 07:47

did.unittitle: Speeches and articles by and about presidents of Yale University

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of biographical material, speeches, interviews, and television transcripts by or about Kingman Brewster, Jr., A. Bartlett Giamatti, Benno C. Schmidt and Howard Lamar as presidents of Yale University.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of Public Affairs

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 2-A (YRG 2-A), Records of the Yale president's office.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is partially restricted. See inventory for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Speeches and Articles by and about Presidents of Yale University (RU 65). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of biographical material, speeches, interviews, and television transcripts by or about Kingman Brewster, Jr., A. Bartlett Giamatti, Benno C. Schmidt and Howard Lamar as presidents of Yale University.

controlaccess.subject: College presidents
Educators
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Office of Public Affairs

Yale News and Review, Pg. 10 --- 1963 May 11
Yale University News Bureau, Press Relaese #135 --- 1963 Nov 22
